subject: Football
Domestic Violence
lead_paragraph: The Ravens would like to close the curtain on the Rice era, but an arbitrator ruled on the N.F.L.'s flawed process, not Rice’s character, and questions remain about how the team dealt with him.
snippet: The Ravens would like to close the curtain on the Rice era, but an arbitrator ruled on the N.F.L.'s flawed process, not Rice’s character, and questions remain about how the team dealt with him.
